articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Vice FM of Russia
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Vice FM of Russia
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, met and had a friendly talk with Aleksei Borodavkin, vice- foreign minister of Russia, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday when they paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Gift from Vice FM of Russia
articles.content:
Gift from Vice FM of Russia
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from Aleksei Borodavkin, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The vice foreign minister of Russia handed the gift to Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, Monday.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Congratulates Irish PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Congratulates Irish PM
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Premier Choe Yong Rim on March 11 sent a message of congratulations to Enda Kenny on his election as Irish Prime Minister.
					 The message wished him success in his responsible work for prosperity of the country and welfare of his people.
					
					 Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message of congratulations to    Eamon Gilmore on his appointment as Irish foreign minister on the same day.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to President of Japan Red Cross Society
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to President of Japan Red Cross Society 
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Jang Jae On, chairman of the C.C., the DPRK Red Cross Society, Monday sent a message of sympathy to Konoe Tadateru, president of the Japan Red Cross Society.
					 The message said:
					
					 Upon hearing the sad news that the northeastern part of your country was hit by unprecedented earthquake and tsunami that claimed huge casualties and material losses, I extend deep sympathy and consolation to you and, through you, to the victims and their families on behalf of the DPRK Red Cross Society.
					
					 It is my hope that the living of the victims will come to normal as early as possible thanks to the positive efforts of your society.

articles.title: DPRK Establishes Technology of Cultivating Vegetables of New Species
articles.content:
DPRK Establishes Technology of Cultivating Vegetables of New Species
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute, a comprehensive center for vegetable science research and production, established a system for cultivating vegetables of new species based on the cutting-edge science and technology.
					 The predecessor of the institute is the Pyongyang Vegetable Experiment Station founded in Juche 48 (1959). The institute has since developed into a center for the research into vegetable science and its production.
					
					 There sprang up in Pyongyang in the new century a large area of modern greenhouses, the first of its kind in the DPRK.
					
					 There are water culture hothouses built by its own efforts and indigenous technology to suit the actual conditions of the country.
					
					 The manufacture and management of the nutritious liquid, the control of hothouse environment and watering of crops and application of fertilizers, etc. are computerized to boost the efficiency in the research into the vegetable growing in hothouses and its production.
					
					 The issues of nutritious liquid and substrate suited to the actual conditions of the area have been solved to fully ensure the normal operation of the water culture hothouses. 
					
					 Solar-heated vinyl sheet-roofed hothouses have been successfully built to keep the temperature there higher than that in the existing hothouses.
					
					 The institute successfully introduces scientific and technological achievements into production. 
					
					 High-yielding species of vegetables strong enough to stand diseases have been cultivated. Among the newly bred dozens of species of fruit and leaf vegetables with high productivity and nutrition include eggplant, hot pepper and cabbage. 
					
					 The institute also cultivated vegetables of various species suited to various hothouses.
					
					 Signal progress has been made in the research into environmentally friendly vegetables, too.
					
					  Researches have been conducted to cultivate vegetables of new species to lower the content of harmful substance in vegetables and select right soil for them, etc. to lay a solid scientific and technological foundation to produce environmentally friendly vegetables in the country.
					
					 Innovations have been effected in the researches into the technology of cultivating vegetables, too.
					
					 They include the selection of species of vegetables and sowing machines suited to the phase-to-phase cultivation of cabbage at vinyl sheet-roofed hothouses in winter and the solution of the issue of how many vegetable plants should be planted per phyong.  
					
					 The institute has developed the technology of cultivating radish in all seasons and that of cultivating quality vegetables and newly bred species of vegetables has been successfully introduced into production.

articles.title: Pyongyang Floriculture Institute Turned into Flower Cultivation Centre
articles.content:
Pyongyang Floriculture Institute Turned into Flower Cultivation Centre
						
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Floriculture Institute of the DPRK turned into the modern floriculture centre. It has modern green houses, flower experimental plots and advanced bio-engineering facilities whose processes are all automatically controlled with the help of computers.
					 The institute selected and bred tulip species of bright prospect of cultivation and improved varieties of flower species such as chrysanthemum and dahlia. It also produced a lot of new species.
					
					 In this course, it succeeded in developing dozens of flower species suited to the climatic conditions of Korea including cosmos and zinnia.
					
					 It has deepened the study to establish the technology of cultivation.
					
					 It systematically studied and completed the advanced technology of cultivation such as the method of cultivating the cuttings of rose, one of species with greatest varieties on a world-wide scale, and the technology for producing root nodule of tulip.
					
					 It also completed the method of propagating flowers through tissue culture. 
					
					 It newly built the cultivation process equipped with the latest technology and applied bio-engineering technology to the new species of flowers. It, therefore, completed one by one the method of propagating flowers through tissue culture, confirming indices of cultivation technology.
					
					 Big advance was made in cultivating flowers through gene transfer, in particular.
					
					 The institute transplanted drought-resistant gene separated from wild plant to a leaf cell of all-season chrysanthemum. It also succeeded in its tissue culture, thus producing flowers by method of gene transfer for the first time in the country.
					
					 It also made it possible to produce various species of necessary flowers as wished, opening a bright prospect of putting flower cultivation on a scientific and industrial basis and rapidly developing flower production. 
					
					 It has become possible to mass-produce various species of beautiful flowers by tissue culture and spread them in Pyongyang and different parts of the country.

articles.title: Large-Scale Magic Performance to Be Given in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Large-Scale Magic Performance to Be Given in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A large-scale magic performance will take place in Pyongyang, the capital of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The program will include appearance and disappearance of aircraft, large bus with full passengers and big animals like elephant, as well as a motorcyclist's fantastic skill and the magician's floating in the air as if in a gravity-free space.
					
					 The aircraft, large bus and elephants are all real ones.
					
					 The spectators will enjoy a new form of magic show with several numbers connected with each other.
					
					 The performer is Kim Chol (50), a vice-chairman of the Magicians Association of Korea and head of the magic creation group of the Pyongyang Circus.
					
					 His father Kim Thaek Song and his younger brother Kim Kwang Chol are also talented magician.
					
					 He became an eye-catcher already in his teens, drawing the limelight of the magic circles.
					
					 He began to distinguish himself with his marked individuality at international magic festivals from the 1980s.
					
					 His masterpieces are "Girls Reflected in a Mirror" and "A Rich Catch of Catfish".
					
					 Magic pieces of the DPRK won more than 20 top prizes at international magic festivals..
					
					Founded in Juche 41 (1952), the Pyongyang Circus has produced 1,200 acrobatic works, winning more than 70 awards including 36 gold prizes at 38 international circus festivals.
					
					The circus has performed on 35,000 occasions in total at home and abroad, including 250 tours around the globe, earning international prestige.
					
					 The premiere of the magic show will be given on April 18, a day of the 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					
					 The performance will be staged about six times, twice a week.
					
					 Its venue is May Day Stadium, well known for the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang."
					
					 Many local and foreign people have booked tickets for the spectacle.

articles.title: Sindok Mineral Water Available for All Nampho Citizens
articles.content:
Sindok Mineral Water Available for All Nampho Citizens 
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Sindok Mineral Water is provided to all households in Nampho City, the DPRK.
					 The spring water from Mt. Sindok is good for the treatment of digestive troubles and health promotion.
					
					 The city has set up water supply centers in Hanggu and Waudo Districts.
					
					 The twelve supply stores in the city, open all day long, are equipped with large water tanks and other necessary facilities.

articles.title: Koryo Medical Book Restored to Original State
articles.content:
Koryo Medical Book Restored to Original State
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- "Ouichalyobang" is a medical classic of Korea.
					 The book, printed in April 1226, contains important prescriptions given out by the King's physician in the period of Koryo.
					
					 The classic is the oldest printed medical book known in the country.
					
					 It had been used as a valuable reference book in medical treatment and education for a long time, but disappeared later.
					
					 Thanks to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of discovering and preserving national cultural heritages, the ancient book was restored to its original state some time ago for the first time in the country. 
					
					 The restored book, illustrative of the development and features of Korea's traditional medicine, is very helpful not only to medical treatment but also to the study of the Korean history of medicine and culture.

articles.title: Nationwide Assistance to Agriculture
articles.content:
Nationwide Assistance to Agriculture
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A nationwide assistance has been provided to rural communities throughout the DPRK from the beginning of the year.
					 In North Phyongan Province, large quantities of farming materials, including 18,700 tools, were sent to rural communities in January.
					
					 People of South Phyongan Province contributed hundreds of thousands of farming tools to co-op farms and collected tens of tons of idle materials for the farm implement factories and farm machine stations in the province.
					
					 South and North Hwanghae provinces have also rendered much assistance to farms.
					
					 Housewives in South Hamgyong Province produced hundreds of thousands of tons of manure and those in Haeju City and Thaethan County in South Hwanghae Province carried 20 000 tons of homemade compost to fields.

articles.title: Pothonggang Department Store
articles.content:
Pothonggang Department Store
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Pothonggang Department Store was built on the banks of the River Pothong in Pyongyang.
					The shopping mall has a total floor space of several thousands of square meters. All its business activities ranging from warehousing to selling are digitalized.
					
					The supermarket sells cosmetics, household articles and daily necessities on the first floor, grain, meat, vegetables, essential foodstuffs and processed foodstuffs on the second floor and household electric appliances, clothes and furniture on the third floor.
					
					It has another building for seafood.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the store in December last year and called on it to play a big role in improving the living standard in the city.

articles.title: Mt. Suyang Wall
articles.content:
Mt. Suyang Wall
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The wall of Mt. Suyang in Haeju City, South Hwanghae Province was built in the period of Koguryo kingdom.
					 The wall commands a complete view of the Yonbaek Plain and Haeju Bay.
					
					 The wall is 5 258 meters in circumference and about five meters in height, high in the eastern, southern and northern parts and low in the western part. There are two deep valleys and an open space inside the wall.
					
					 The wall was erected two-fold, capped by big flat stones 0.3 meter forward.
					
					 The wall has four lintelled gates in all directions.
					
					 Water drains through a valley east of the south gate to form the Suyang Waterfall.
					
					 The wall is associated with Korean people's fight against Japanese invaders in the Imjin Patriotic War (1592-1598).

articles.title: Hoeryong's Clay for Ceramics
articles.content:
Hoeryong's Clay for Ceramics 
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Hoeryong in North Hamgyong Province, the DPRK, has long been proud of quality clay for ceramics.
					 Clay is one of Hoeryong's three beauties.
					
					 The area has been well known as a famous earthenware producer from the Neolithic era.
					
					 Porcelains made of white clay are gentle in shape, tender in color and diverse in decorative pattern.
					
					 The porcelains remind one of the beautiful features of the local women. 
					
					 Particularly, glazed earthenware produced in the area is popular throughout the country. The light gray earthenware keeps foodstuff fresh. It is also efficacious for preventing endemics.

articles.title: Samsong Temple Associated with History of Tangun
articles.content:
Samsong Temple Associated with History of Tangun
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Samsong Temple is one of the tourist attractions in Mt. Kuwol on the west coast of Korea.
					 The building had been burnt away by the Japanese imperialists as part of their effort to erase the history of Tangun, the ancestral father of the Korean nation, when they were occupying Korea.
					
					 It was rebuilt in September Juche 89 (2000).
					
					 It consists of a gable-roof gate and several buildings with the Samsong Shrine in the center.
					
					 Samsong means three saints -- Tangun, his father Hwan Ung and his grandfather Hwan In.
					
					 It served as a venue of annual memorial services for them.

articles.title: US Ulterior Aim to Round off Formation of Military Alliance Disclosed
articles.content:
US Ulterior Aim to Round off Formation of Military Alliance Disclosed
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The United States is mulling opening a meeting of what it called "security consultative committee" for tightening the alliance with Japan in May at a time when it is ceaselessly staging joint military exercises with Japan and south Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					  Lurking behind this move is a criminal aim to round off the formation of the triangular military alliance involving the U.S., Japan and south Korea as it is designed to tighten the new military nexus with Japan. 
					
					 Last year Japan and south Korea laid a new cornerstone for military tie-up called a "joint declaration on security," boosting the cooperation for aggression. This year the U.S. seeks to set up a pillar called "security consultative committee" on it in a bid to push forward the moves for tightening the alliance with Japan in real earnest. 
					
					 The U.S. has built the framework of the triangular military alliance through "the Mutual Defense Treaty" with south Korea and through "the Security Pact" with Japan. When Japan concludes a "treaty for compressive use and protection of military intelligence," etc. with south Korea, the triangular military alliance will be rounded off as a law, in actuality. 
					
					Through the tightened U.S. -Japan alliance and the formation of the triangular military alliance the U.S. warlike forces seek to form a double alliance with Japan, strictly subordinate it to the U.S. war policy and plug south Korea into it in a bid to secure an unchallenged military edge in Asia and knock into shape a military bloc for aggression capable of standing against their potential rivals and anti-imperialist independent countries.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to bear in mind that the triangular military alliance designed to escalate the military confrontation and spark a war would get it nowhere.

articles.title: Peace Vital for Korean Nation--Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Peace Vital for Korean Nation--Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- It is a vital issue for the Korean nation to avert a war and preserve peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in by-lined article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Due to dangerous moves of the United States and south Korean authorities to invade the DPRK the north-south relations are still in a catastrophic stage and the situation on the Korean Peninsula is getting tenser and more acute than ever before. 
					
					 The struggle for peace is the patriotic and just one to defend the homeland of the nation and pave the way for independently carving out its destiny. 
					
					 The Korean nation should share its destiny with its territory to the last. Therefore, it should prevent the danger of war by aggression forces at home and abroad and firmly defend peace and security on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 It is impossible to achieve durable peace on the peninsula nor is it possible to defend the destiny and security of the Korean nation unless an end is put to the U.S. vicious hostile policy toward the DPRK and the war moves of the south Korean authorities following it. 
					
					 Whoever is concerned about the destiny of the country and the nation as a Korean should turn out in the action to decisively frustrate the reckless moves of the warmongers to ignite a war. 
					
					 No war force on earth can ever overpower the united force of the Korean nation for peace against war.
					
					 The victory in the struggle for peace is in store for the Korean nation which turned out to frustrate war moves of aggression forces inside and outside.

articles.title: Application of Tuition-Free Program to Korean Schools in Japan Urged
articles.content:
Application of Tuition-Free Program to Korean Schools in Japan Urged
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- South Korean poet Yun Hui Sang staged a one-man demo outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on March 11. He urged the Japanese government to apply the tuition-waiver program to the Korean schools in Japan.
					 The education in Korean language at the Korean schools should be kept on to defend national identity of the Koreans' community in Japan, Yun said.
					
					 It is natural for the Japanese government to promote assistance to the Korean schools, legal education organs of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, Yun stressed.

articles.title: US-South Korea Joint Military Exercises Refuted
articles.content:
US-South Korea Joint Military Exercises Refuted
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea denounced the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises against the DPRK. It made public a statement on March 6.
					 Through Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises the U.S. and south Korean warlike forces seek to dash the hope of all the Korean people for independent and peaceful reunification and stamp out socialist Korea with a preemptive attack. They also aim to plunge mankind into a nuclear holocaust, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The outrageous provocation acts of the south Korean authorities in collision with outside imperialists is a challenge to the world peace. It is also a violation of the legitimate right to self-determination of the people of all the countries who have the right to opt for their own political system.
					
					 The refusal to the DPRK's proposal for dialogue rendered the south Korean authorities isolated in diplomatic field. As a way-out of it they are holding the military exercises with nuclear weapons involved but they had better think twice, bearing deep in mind that the DPRK is ready for both dialogue and confrontation.
					
					 The Japanese Liaison Council for Joint Action in Asia also made public a statement on March 4 strongly demanding a total halt to the dangerous military actions of the U.S., Japan and south Korea which threaten the peace not only in the Korean Peninsula but the rest of Asia.

articles.title: Principled Stand of DPRK Supported
articles.content:
Principled Stand of DPRK Supported
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain released a statement on March 7 in support of the principled stand of the DPRK on the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					 The Korean Friendship Association positively supports the March 1 statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry and the February 27 statement of the Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 The DPRK proposed dialogue and negotiations for peace and detente on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The south Korean authorities do not want peace on the peninsula and opt for confrontation with the compatriots.
					
					 The DPRK, boasting of the might of a single-minded unity, has never said empty words.
					
					 Just is the stand of the army and people of the DPRK to react to the aggressors' nuclear blackmail with Korean-style nuclear deterrent and to their missile threat with missile strike.
					
					 The Korean Friendship Association is convinced that the army and people of the DPRK would firmly defend sovereignty and dignity of the country by countering the aggression moves of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group with decisive military measures.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated Worldwide
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated Worldwide
						
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday was significantly celebrated worldwide.
					 He received floral baskets from the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, the president of Laos who doubles as the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and the chief of the Palestinian National Authority.
					
					 Many political parties, organizations and personages from all walks of life sent gifts to him. They include the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, the China Association for International Friendly Contact, the Beijing Association for International Friendly Contact, the State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia and the minister of Defence of Syria. The Russian Federation of International Charity Organizations "World of Good Will" presented order "Heart of Devotion" and the Loja City Government in Loja Province of Ecuador the honorary title of "Great Defender".
					
					 The chairman and managing director of the Jinpei Century Investment Group Co., Ltd. of China presented the natural stone, the best one among the 4 famous stones in China. Many other countries also sent him a lot of gifts wishing him good health and well-being.
					
					 The king of Cambodia and heads of state, political parties, ministries, organizations, institutions and personages of different strata of many other countries sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassies in their countries on the same occasion.
					
					 Events to celebrate Feb. 16 were held in more than 90 countries and regions on over 350 occasions.
					
					 The events of various forms witnessed the enthusiastic feelings of the participants praising him as the world political statesman and the ever-victorious Songun commander. They included meetings, seminars, lectures, round-table talks, book and photo exhibitions and film shows.
					
					 Organizations of many countries published commemorative bulletins under the titles "Marshal Kim Jong Il, the Leader of the Korean People and the Progressive Mankind in the 21st century", "Historic Exploits of General Kim Jong Il" and "Son of People", etc. More than 300 media in different countries introduced the immortal exploits and personality of the peerlessly great man. -0-

articles.title: Damage by Quake and Tsunami Expands in Japan
articles.content:
Damage by Quake and Tsunami Expands in Japan
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Damage caused by Friday's catastrophic earthquake and tsunami expands in Japan. 
					NHK said that the number of people who have died totaled more than 1,600, missing were over 10,000 and over 380,000 fled for safety as of Sunday morning.
					
					 Explosion occurred twice at the nuclear reactor building of Fukushima No. 1 nuclear plant on Saturday and Sunday, causing leakage of huge radioactivity. 
					
					According to the measurement just after the explosion, the numerical value of radioactivity was about 1,000 times that of normal value in the area around the central control room of the nuclear plant No. 1 and more than 70 times in the area of the gate of the power station.
					
					 160 people were estimated to have suffered from radioactivity. 
					
					 In the wake of the explosion at the nuclear plant No. 1, nuclear plants No. 2 and No. 3 were put on emergency alert.
					
					 Following the explosions the Japanese government set the area within the 20 kilometers radius centering on the plant No. 1 as dangerous area and demanded the inhabitants there leave the place.
					
					 The quake turned Kesennuma City of Miyagi Prefecture into a sea of fire and put the bank in Nagano Prefecture on the verge of collapse. In many other prefectures chaos goes on with railways and roads cut off, traffic paralyzed and drinking water and electricity power supply as well as communications stopped.
					
					 Traffic service is completely cut off in Tokyo, leaving millions stranded.
					
					 The Japan Meteorological Agency made public the result of analysis of the quake on Sunday.
					
					 According to it, the epicenter was about 500 km long and about 200 km wide in the waters off Iwate Prefecture and Ibaraki Prefecture and it is also confirmed that seismic fault-lines were disrupted one by one in succession.
					
					The magnitude of the quake was revised to 9.0 to be the largest in the world history and its energy size was confirmed to be nearly 1,000 times that of the Hanshin quake.
					
					 A seismologist of Japan clarified that a fault about 450 km long and about 200 km wide was disrupted 23 meters at the maximum.
					
					 More than 100 aftershocks with over 4.6 magnitudes followed on Sunday alone and still more are likely to occur.
					
					 It is presumed that more than 7.0-magnitude quake can also follow.

articles.title: US Trade Deficit Up 15.1% to $46.34 Bil.
articles.content:
US Trade Deficit Up 15.1% to $46.34 Bil.
						
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. trade deficit in global goods and services in January widened 15.1 percent from the previous month to $46.34 billion for the third straight monthly increase, the U.S. Commerce Department said on March 10.

articles.title: Meeting Held in China to Learn from Progressive Deed of Tai Zhongli
articles.content:
Meeting Held in China to Learn from Progressive Deed of Tai Zhongli
 Beijing, March 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in the Nanjing Military Area on March 7 to learn from the progressive deed of Tai Zhongli. It was co-sponsored by the Publicity Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China, the General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army and the Heilongjiang Provincial Committee of the CPC.
					 Wang Xiaoying, deputy director of the Political Department of the Nanjing Military Area of the CPLA, said at the meeting that Tai set an example to be followed by the officers and men of the units of CPLA. He underscored the need for the revolutionary soldiers to consider Tai's progressive deed as a good textbook for establishing a core view on value among them at present and encourage them to remain faithful to their mission, standing firm at their posts. 
					
					 Similar meetings will take place in different parts of China including Jinan City, Shandong Province.

articles.title: Exhibition of Major Scientific-Technological Achievements Opens in China
articles.content:
Exhibition of Major Scientific-Technological Achievements Opens in China
 Beijing, March 12 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of major scientific and technological achievements was opened in Beijing on Mar. 8.
					 This exhibition was co-sponsored by the Organizational Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China, the State Committee for Development and Reforms of the State Council, the Ministry of Science and Technology, the Ministry of Education, the Academy of Sciences, etc.
					
					 It was reported that the exhibition is aimed to comprehensively review the major scientific and technological successes made in the period of the eleventh five-year plan and give full play to the spirit of independent innovations.

articles.title: All-China Women's Federation Calls on All Chinese Women to Study Hard
articles.content:
All-China Women's Federation Calls on All Chinese Women to Study Hard
 Beijing, March 12 (KCNA) -- Chen Zhili, chairwoman of the All-China Women's Federation, called on all the women to study hard at a meeting held on Mar. 7. It was held to confer the title of March 8 Red Flag Standard-bearer across the country (organization) upon the women who performed merits in their activities to build advanced grass-roots level party organizations and become good members of the Communist Party of China.
					 She said that broad strata of women should harden their ideals and faith and make redoubled efforts to perform fresh feats in their activities again to build advanced grass-roots level party organizations and become good members of the CPC during the period of the twelfth five-year plan.
					
					 She expressed the hope that all the women would give fuller play to new traits, make a positive contribution to social harmony and stability and study hard to become women with high qualifications in the era.

articles.title: Voluntary Activities for Higher Civilization and New Spirit Called for in China
articles.content:
Voluntary Activities for Higher Civilization and New Spirit Called for in China 
 Beijing, March 12 (KCNA) -- The Publicity Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the Office of Beijing's Spiritual Civilization Construction Commission held a meeting in Beijing on March 7. They made arrangements for voluntary service activities to establish new traits while giving importance to higher civilization.
					 The meeting said that these activities are the effective way for increasing the moral level of the whole society and provide a sure guarantee for strengthening its management and holding major activities including the celebrations of the 90th anniversary of the CPC.
					
					 It underscored the need to unify the idea and successfully conduct all the work and thus bring about a surge in the voluntary service activities. It also stressed the need to create highly civilized and harmonious social circumstances favorable for celebrating the 90th anniversary of the party founding.

articles.title: Hamas Accuses Israel of Abducting Palestinian Engineer
articles.content:
Hamas Accuses Israel of Abducting Palestinian Engineer
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for Hamas on March 11 in a press statement accused Israel of abducting a Palestinian engineer. 
					 The Israeli intelligence kidnapped him in February while he was in Ukraine and took him to one of its prisons, the spokesman said, branding it as a wanton violation of international law.
					
					 He strongly called on Israel to free him as immediately as possible.

articles.title: President of Chechnya Accuses West of Backing Terrorism
articles.content:
President of Chechnya Accuses West of Backing Terrorism
 Moscow, March 12 (KCNA) -- Lamzan Kadirov, president of the Autonomous Republic of Chechnya of Russia, at a press conference on March 8 accused the West of supporting terrorists.
					 He said that western countries condemn terrorism in word, but in fact they offer havens to terrorists.
					
					 He added that the authorities of Chechnya will find the mastermind behind the explosion at the Domodedov International Airport in Moscow as soon as possible and punish him.

articles.title: Cuba Records Nearly 5,000 Successful Kidney Transplants
articles.content:
Cuba Records Nearly 5,000 Successful Kidney Transplants
 Havana, March 12 (KCNA) -- Cuba has performed 4,813 successful kidney transplants since 1970, a Cuban health official said on March 9.
					 Cuba conducted its first kidney transplant in February 1970 at the Nephrology Institute of Havana.

articles.title: Cambodia Starts to Build Container Terminal
articles.content:
Cambodia Starts to Build Container Terminal
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Cambodia broke ground for the construction of the Kingdom's second largest new container terminal of Phnom Penh Autonomous Port on March 9.
					 According to the master plan, the 10-hectare terminal is being constructed. It will take 30 months to be completed.
					
					 The terminal will have a total capacity of 120,000 TEUs (20- foot equivalent unit) per year.

Venezuelan Authorities Seize Cocaine
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Venezuelan authorities on Mar. 9 seized 417 kilograms of cocaine in Anzoategui state of Venezuela.
					 During this year, the Venezuelan authorities have seized 9.5 tons of different drugs.

articles.title: Domestic Violence Rampant in Japan
articles.content:
Domestic Violence Rampant in Japan
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The number of domestic violence cases police recognized in 2010 soared 20.2 percent from the year before to 33,852, the highest since an annual survey commenced in 2002, the National Police Agency said on March 10.

articles.title: Jang Jae On expresa condolencias a su homologo japones
articles.content:
Jang Jae On expresa condolencias a su homologo japones
						
Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ATCC) -- El presidente del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja (ACR) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jang Jae On, envio este lunes al presidente de la Sociedad de Cruz Roja de Japon (SCRJ), Tadateru Konoe, el siguiente telegrama de consuelo:.
					Informado de la triste noticia de que los terremotos y consiguientes tsunamis de una magnitud sin precedentes, ocurridos en el nordeste de su pais, causaron enormes perdidas humanas y materiales, expreso en nombre de la ACR de la RPDC profundas condolencias y compasion a usted y por su conducto, a las victimas y sus familiares.
					
					Deseo que se estabilice cuanto antes la vida de los damnificados gracias a los ingentes esfuerzos de la SCRJ.

articles.title: Crecen expectativas de la gran funcion de magia
articles.content:
Crecen expectativas de la gran funcion de magia
Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tendra lugar en esta capital la gran funcion de magia del Conjunto de Circense de Pyongyang.
					  Los espectadores quedaran hechizados cuando vean el avion, omnibus y animales grandes como elefante apareciendo o esfumandose, habilidades de motocicletas y al mago flotando en el aire como en el espacio de ingravidez.
					
					 A diferencia de tal costumbre, los espectadores veran varios programas combinados sucesiva y artisticamente.
					
					 El mago es Kim Chol (de 50 anos de edad), jefe del grupo de creacion de magia del Conjunto Circense de Pyongyang.
					
					 Su padre Kim Thaek Song y hermano menor Kim Kwang Chol son famosos magos tambien.
					
					A su tierna edad de 10 anos y pico, aparecio como estrella en el circulo de magia y ya en la decada de 1980, acaparo la atencion del publico y especialistas en varios festivales internacionales de magia.
					
					Entre sus obras famosas hay "muchachas en espejo" y "abundante cosecha de siluros".
					
					Tiene tambien el cargo de vicepresidente de la Asociacion de Magia de Corea.
					
					La magia de Corea recibio mas de 20 premios maximos en varios festivales internacionales de magia.
					
					Durante casi 60 anos despues de fundado en el 41 (1952) de la Era Juche, el Conjunto Circense de Pyongyang creo mas de mil 200 piezas acrobaticas y participo en los 38 festivales internacionales de circo en que recibio mas de 70 premios incluyendo 36 de oro.
					
					Ofrecio funciones en mas de 250 paises y se granjeo la fama mundial a traves de sus funciones en el interior y el exterior del pais que sobrepasan 35 mil en el numero.
					
					La gran funcion de magia estrenara el 18 de abril en el capitalino Estadio Primero de Mayo, que se hizo famoso con la funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang", durante el 27 Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera.
					
					 La funcion se ofrecera 6 veces en total y dos veces a la semana.
					
					Actualmente, numerosas personas nacionales y extranjeras estan reservando la entrada.
					
					Pyongyang invita a todo el mundo y acogera con mucho gusto a los visitantes.

articles.title: Thomas Curley se entrevista con ITAR-TASS sobre su visita a Corea
articles.content:
Thomas Curley se entrevista con ITAR-TASS sobre su visita a Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ATCC) -- En entrevista con ITAR-TASS concedida el dia 10, el  presidente de la agencia norteamericana AP, Thomas Curley, expreso la satisfaccion por el resultado de su reciente visita a Corea. 
					Tras calificar de estimulante la visita de su comitiva a Corea, el continuo asi: 
					
					Estamos complacidos del resultado de nuestra visita a Corea.
					
					Tuvimos la oportunidad de contactarnos con los coreanos.
					
					Me gustaron la ciudad de Pyongyang con muchos bosques y los platos coreanos.
					
					Seria dificil encontrar en este mundo un lugar tan hermoso y maravilloso como esa capital.
